title: 999 ARAM wins, looking for a Rioter for my 1000th
body: I'm at 999 ARAM wins any Rioters want to join me for my 1000th?

replies.body: How bout 2 Rioters for your 1000th win....? xD
LEGGO.
Sweet
I see I need to move to NA for my 7000th ARAM game - or 3500th ARAM win. ^^
When are you free? :)
ill be good to play in 15-20 minutes =D
Sure thing - Zimberfly and I are free in 30, just gotta head to a meeting first. Add me, and we'll get this game going in a bit! :D
ugh... Riot employees are so fkkkking cool! <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AUVAUEua,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-29T20:06:49.517+0000)
>
> When are you free? :)

I played against you when One for All first came out. I was Shen and you were Jinx and we were both top. It was a fun game
Ohhh shit! Hi! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AUVAUEua,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-06-30T21:04:33.373+0000)
>
> Ohhh shit! Hi! :D

Aaaaaye
inb4 you go on a 5 loss streak with a rioter
ikr lol

means you get to play more than one game with them though 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
true true
It only took us two tries, we got stomped in the first match. :P
Yeah the first game was pretty unfortunate lol. Thanks for playing though!

> It only took us two tries, we got stomped in the first match. :P

Katey do you think you can get Tantram to join me for my 5000th ARAM win? I need about 1500 more wins or so but I'll get there.
This is so boss that you riot guys did this.  Thanks for being awesome
did u win??
Not the first but we won the second!
can i do this for my 3000th?

I did for my 3000th as well - and I got lucky. :)
_Recording the game was obviously a given._
Wont hurt to ask
Wait...someone that doesn't play aram for missions?????
I'm pretty bad at 1v1 and 2v2 laning and aram lets you move right to the teamfight phase of the game so it works for me. Also no one gets mad if you play off meta stuff so thats a bonus too.
Wish a Rioter replied for my 1000th in Norms q.q

> [{quoted}](name=JustARivenMain,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AUVAUEua,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-06-30T02:52:03.763+0000)
>
> Wish a Rioter replied for my 1000th in Norms q.q

I wish I remembered my 1000th game. After it was removed from your profile (in new client) I didn't know where to check my wins.
I've surpassed it by a lot now though rip.
Bump dis
wow riot games, really cool you guys did that
Yisus Craist, 1000 Aram games played....
Jeebus Kraist, I'm sitting here with 6674 ARAM games played....
lucker
You definitely need to record this!
This is so corny who cares
Lel
